metadata.name: !zh_cn translation mods
metadata.description: This is a mod pack which include some mods' EID translation for Chinese Note that I do not completely follow the original EID descriptions and add A LOT things [h1]What do we have?[/h1] * [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3372219983]Kicks and Giggles[/url](ALL information from IsaacGuru wiki) * [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3317049547]Road to Enlightment[/url](not fully finished but basically works fine) * [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3440586497]Lost and Forgotton[/url] * [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3408993906]Lazy Mattpack[/url](Latest updates: Dead litter item) * [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3428410287]Curiosity Crate[/url](Latest updates: toy packs) * [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3371826092]Benevolence[/url](Latest updates: Sand of Time and more items) * [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3242166563]Elitium[/url] * [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3281491787]D! Edith[/url] * [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2992868259]!!![/url] * [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2737123333]Furtherance[/url] (Stay tuned) * [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3448644445]Malware mod[/url] [h1]What would occur next?[/h1] * Baphomet Character mod * [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3206290261]Eclipsed[/url] * [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3317408837]A Bushel of Burdens and Blessings[/url] * [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3134600246]Reshaken[/url](cause I think its Chinese sucks) [h1]What we will not add?[/h1] * Fiend Folio and other quite famous old mods([url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2851959966]cause someone else had finished them[/url]) * [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2722017893]Andromeda[/url] and other mods already has Chinese (unless their Chinese really terrible) * [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2638699710]Doki Doki[/url] (I had never played the referenced game so I will not translate this to avoid wrong translation, but if someone else would like to help, this might be added in the furure) [h1]WARNING[/h1] I'm not a profession coder and I just slowly learned how to make EID translation (lets just hope there wont be so much error...)
